DOC.brief_summary: In 2005 , Wyeth conduct study 0887X-101518 ( NCT00488826 ) Chinese infant receive either Prevenar alone ( Group 1 ) , Prevenar give Diphtheria , Tetanus acellular Pertussis ( DTaP ) vaccine ( Group 2 ) DTaP alone ( Group 3 ) . This follow study ( least 3 year last vaccination ) ass antibody concentration child previously complete Wyeth study 0887X-101518 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Antibody Response Healthy Chinese Children Who Have Been Vaccinated Previously With 4-doses Prevenar ( Pneumococcal Vaccine ) Babies Toddlers
DOC.criteria: Male female subject participate complete Wyeth study 0887X 101518 . Healthy subject determine medical history , physical examination , judgment investigator . Vaccination license investigational pneumococcal vaccine since completion Wyeth study 0887X 101518 . History culture proven invasive disease cause S pneumoniae since completion Wyeth study 0887X 101518 . Known suspected immune deficiency suppression since participation Wyeth study 0887X 101518 .
